wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Rieusett Litteljohn (1 April 1881 – 8 December 1919) was an English first-class cricketer active 1905–14 who played for Middlesex and Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC). He was born in Hanwell; died in Marylebone.
